title: LoL Timers
body: Hey guys I just got back into the game after a year of being away and I noticed people putting these sort of premade timers into the chat for their ults, summoner spells or buffs. I just wanted to know how to do that stuff, it would be really helpful, thanks.

replies.body:
[Cooldown pings](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-614-notes#patch-cooldown-pings) came out with Patch 6.14 and are done by pressing *ALT* and *left-clicking* on the icon of the item you want to send a cooldown ping for. This works for Abilities, Summoner spells, Major and Vision items, Jungle timers (don't alt+tab), and Health/Resource bars. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
